evaluation_questions.primary_challenge: Y is the symptom not the cause - must find upstream

difficulty_dimension_scales.causal_distance: 1-10: hops from nearest manipulable node to Y
difficulty_dimension_scales.feedback_prevalence: 0-4: degree to which Y causes upstream nodes
difficulty_dimension_scales.equifinality: 1-4: number of distinct causal paths to Y
